Label: statement composite (content item)
Description: An optional and repeatable group of data elements which together represent a copyright or neighboring right statement for the content item. At least one <CopyrightYear> or one instance of the <CopyrightOwner> composite must be sent within an instance of the composite, but it is recommended that all elements in the composite are explicitly populated. The Copyright statement may be repeated to provide a full structured rights statement listing year(s) and rights holder(s).
